tool_description: Book Information API: Access comprehensive details about books including title, author, genre, summary, reviews, and more.
name: Book Information Library
title: Book Information Library

api_list.name: GET BOOKS
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://book-information-library.p.rapidapi.com/api/books/getall-books"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "book-information-library.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://book-information-library.p.rapidapi.com/api/books/getall-books"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",

print(response.json())
